alert.note: Alert for Polk (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 1:59AM CDT until August 08 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Polk County in western Arkansas... * Until 300 AM CDT. * At 158 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Vandervoort, or 14 miles south of Mena, moving southeast at 20 mph. Another severe storm was just north of Big Cedar in eastern Oklahoma, and was headed toward Polk County. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wickes... Grannis... Hatfield... Vandervoort... Hartley... Cossatot River State Park... Mountain Fork... Mccauley... Cove... Rocky... Camp Pioneer... Hatton... Potter... Bogg Springs... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
